titleStmt.title: Boanerges, or, The Parliament of thunder with their sharp declarations against those rebellious malignants that revolt and fall away from them. For which they are voted evill members of the Common-vvealth, rebels and such who are the cause of all our present and bleeding miseries.

publicationStmt.publisher: [s.n.] Printed for the serious consideration of all men who desire to have a permanent and lasting peace ,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
